title: Topic 001 Question 008
body: You plan to deploy a containerized version of an Azure Cognitive Services service that will be used for text analysis.
You configure https://contoso.cognitiveservices.azure.com as the endpoint URI for the service, and you pull the latest version of the Text Analytics
You need to run the container on an Azure virtual machine by using Docker.
How should you complete the command? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
